playGameOver() - Method in class model.Audio
This method plays "gameOver.wav" melancholy music when the user loses all the balls to give some sort of penalty to user.

playNextLevel() - Method in class model.Audio
This method plays "nextLevel.wav" cheering music when user successfully breaks all the bricks in 1 level and goes to next level to give some sort of reward to user.
